"Hello there! It's anniversary time!": "We're planning an event around the idea of looking back over your happy memories!"

"I've been doing my best to ask around and get ideas, but...
I could really use your help!"
"Whatever you can do to lend a hand, I'd appreciate it...!"
"Are you making any progress? I'll wait as long as it takes!"
"You're always so helpful! I'm counting on you this time too, but don't push yourself too hard!"
"Oh, but don't push yourself too hard! It's summer, after all, so make sure to leave yourself time to enjoy it!"
"ARKS is going through tough times right now, but we should be able to put together a celebration that makes people smile!"
"That's why I'm going all in on planning this event. I want everyone to have a good time!"
"Ughh... It's so hot! Summer can be a lot of fun, but I feel like I'm going to melt!"
"Thank you for listening to my requests, but don't forget to take breaks and stay hydrated!"
"We hold this event every year as a way to get everyone together to celebrate! I hope they'll remember it fondly!"
"It's not even ready yet, but I get so excited whenever I think of all those happy faces!"
"I've got loads of plans this year! There's just so many things I want to try...!"
"I really have to thank you for always listening to my requests!"
"I always feel like I can rely on you! I think this is going to be the best event ever!"
"It's so close now, the anticipation is killing me!"
"Thank you so, so much! An event like this is the perfect way to start our memories of summer... I hope everyone enjoys it!"

"こんにちはっ！
もうすぐ記念行事の季節だね！"

"今回はいつもがんばっている
みんなの疲れを癒せるような
ワクワクなイベントにしたいな！"

"貴方にも準備で手伝って
欲しいことがあるんだけど……
お願いできるかな？"

"いつも協力してくれてありがとう！
今回も、お願いねっ！"

"いつもアークスさんたちは
すごく、すーっごくがんばってるよね！"

"だから、少しの間でも、
このお祝いイベントで
ウキウキワクワクになってほしいんだ！"

"みんなの心が、イベントで楽しい
気持ちでいっぱいにできるように
私もがんばらなくちゃ！"

"お祝いをするには
あれもこれもたくさん必要！
何から準備したらいいか迷っちゃうね！"

"おつかれさまと、ありがとうの
気持ちをみんなに伝えるために
イベントを絶対に成功させるんだ！"

"お手伝いしてくれて、ありがとう！
とってもとーっても助かったよ！"

"うんうん、これで準備もオッケー！
みんなに喜んでもらえる
素敵なイベントにできるよ！"

"あ、もちろん貴方も！
いーっぱいお祝いして
いーっぱい楽しんでね！"
